title: Sophie Bluel - Portfolio
alt: Picture of Sophie Bluel - Portfolio project
description: At ArchiWebos, I'm reinforcing a team to design the portfolio website for an interior architect. My tasks include developing the presentation page for the architect's work, creating the administrator login page, and designing a modal for uploading media.

title: Kasa
description: Tasked with building their apartment rental platform using React. I'm creating components and routes following Figma mockups, while integrating features like photo gallery scrolling and Collapse management.

title: 724 events
description: Following the departure of a previous developer, I'm tasked with resolving remaining bugs, particularly those related to the carousel, event category selection, and displaying the latest event in the footer.
